byline.contributor: Irit Pazner Garshowitz contributed reporting from Jerusalem.

abstract: Mark Oppenheimer Beliefs column describes rise to prominence of Marc Gafni, who through his think tank the Center for Integral Wisdom, seeks to bring little-known 'integral theory' into mainstream; notes that Gafni's rise has alarmed many Jewish leaders who remember him as former rabbi who has checkered past and was once accused of sexually exploiting teenager.
lead_paragraph: Marc Gafni is drawing prominent names to a philosophy called integral theory, but many Jewish leaders know him as a former rabbi dogged by sexual scandals.

headline.main: A Spiritual Leader Gains Stature, Trailed by a Troubled Past
headline.print_headline: A Spiritual Leader Gains Stature, Trailed by a Troubled Past

snippet: Marc Gafni is drawing prominent names to a philosophy called integral theory, but many Jewish leaders know him as a former rabbi dogged by sexual scandals.
